title: Sultana
data:
{{obsolete}} {{item |itemtype=Comestible |name=Sultana |cost=? |weight=0.1 }} {{flavour|A humble raisin.}} A '''sultana''' is a fruit which normally provides 70 [[nutrition]]. They are lightweight and usually come in stacks of 10 or more, making them perfect for Fedhas' powers. '''Carnivore'''
Rank 1: 50.
Rank 2: 30.
Rank 3: 0. '''Herbivore'''
Rank 1: 90.
Rank 2. 110.
Rank 3. 130. At 700 nutrition per [[aum]], sultanas are the most weight-efficient comestible other than [[royal jellies]], and for [[spriggan]]s are in fact more efficient. Unfortunately, one finds so few sultanas in general that this rarely matters. ==History== In [[0.15]], all fruits and vegetables were condensed into the universal "[[fruit]]" item. [[Category:Comestible]]
